ape hitapu hama lekchar kenekma apita godak dewal igannuwa.yasas sar,nipunika mis , nilakshi mis,lekani mis ,ishara sar oya hamadenama uganwapu dewal kawamadawath amathakawenne naha.oya atharin ape anthima awurudde risarch eke supawayisar widiyata hitapu gayana miswa wisheshayinma mathak karanna oona.ape set eke katahari kodnwala mokak hari awulak giya gaman api hamoma mulinma hambuwenna yanne gayana miswayi.gayana misuth mona wade thibunath, api kiparak kihin karadara karath poddakwath tharaha ganne nathuwa apita oona de kiyala denawa.eeta amatharawa ape anthima awuruddedi ape staf ekata aluthin aapu dlhan sarwath mathak karanna oona.sar apita igannuwe bohoma punchi kalayak unata ee punchi kaledi ape jiwithawalata wadagath godak dewal igannuwa.sar ge lekchar eke anthima winadi 15 godak welawata wenkarala thibbe , apita dhanathmaka chinthanaya gana awabodhayak labadenna.mama athulu api hamotama ee dewal issarahata godak wadagath wewi.apita dawasak hari ugannapu hama denatama bohoma sthuthiyi.
